name: Asteroids (itch) (Toolkitman)
description:
This is an Asteroids Clone Arcade Game. You are alone in the space with your spaceship full of ammo and you have to destroy all the Asteroids to save the Planet.

Make more points that you can!!!

Made a mod that let restart the game after pressing OK in the score windows.

Added a Asteroids Game version with Background Music name "Asteroids 1.0"
